00120             function                set_add_limitations( $theAddLimitation )
00121             {
00122                   try
00123                   {
00124                         if( $this->AddLimitations === '1 = 1' )
00125                         {
00126                               $this->AddLimitations = $theAddLimitation;
00127                         }
00128                         else
00129                         {
00130                               throw( new Exception( '"AddLimitations" was already set' ) );
00131                         }
00132                   }

00161             function                create( $Record )
00162             {
00163                   try
00164                   {
00165                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 
00166                               'title:string;root_id:integer;direct_category:integer,default_0,allow_not_set;'.
00167                                     'mask:integer,default_0,allow_not_set'
00168                         );
00169                         
00170                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00171 
00172                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00173                         
00174                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00175                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_category' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00176                         
00177                         return( $id );
00178                   }
00179                   catch( Exception $e )
00180                   {
00181                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00182                   }
00183             }

00207             function                update( $id , $Record )
00208             {
00209                   try
00210                   {
00211                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00212                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( 
00213                               $Record , 'title:string;root_id:integer;direct_category:integer;mask:integer' , 'allow_not_set'
00214                         );
00215 
00216                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00217                         
00218                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00219                         {
00220                               $this->Database->update( 
00221                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00222                               );
00223                               $this->Database->commit();
00224                         }
00225                   }
00226                   catch( Exception $e )
00227                   {
00228                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00229                   }
00230             }

00286             function                delete( $cid )
00287             {
00288                   try
00289                   {
00290                         $cid = $this->Security->get( $cid , 'integer_list' );
00291                         
00292                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00293                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_before_delete_category' , array( 'id' => $cid ) );
00294                         
00295                         $this->Database->delete( 'umx_category' , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $cid )" );
00296                         $this->Database->commit();
00297                         
00298                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00299                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_delete_category' , array( 'id' => $cid ) );
00300                   }
00301                   catch( Exception $e )
00302                   {
00303                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00304                   }

00367             function                unsafe_select( $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00368             {
00369                   try
00370                   {
00371                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00372                         
00373                         return( $this->Database->select( '*' , 'umx_category' , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition" ) );
00374                   }
00375                   catch( Exception $e )
00376                   {
00377                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00378                   }

00419             function                select( $Start , $Limit , $Field = false , $Order = false , $Condition = '1 = 1' )
00420             {
00421                   try
00422                   {
00423                         $Condition = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->select_condition( 
00424                               $Start , $Limit , $Field , $Order , $Condition , $this->NativeTable
00425                         );
00426                         
00427                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00428 
00429                         return( 
00430                               $this->Database->select( 
00431                                     'umx_category.id AS cid , umx_category.title AS ctitle , c2.title AS croot_title , '.
00432                                           'c3.title AS cdirect_title , umx_category.mask AS cmask , umx_category.category_name '.
00433                                           'AS category_name' , 'umx_category , umx_category AS c2 , umx_category AS c3' , 
00434                                     '( ( umx_category.root_id = c2.id AND umx_category.direct_category = c3.id ) OR '.
00435                                     "( umx_category.id = c2.id AND c2.id = c3.id AND umx_category.root_id = 0 ) ) AND $Condition"
00436                               )
00437                         );
00438                   }
00439                   catch( Exception $e )
00440                   {
00441                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00442                   }
00443             }

00467             function                get_category_id( $Name )
00468             {
00469                   try
00470                   {
00471                         if( $this->Dictionary === false )
00472                         {
00473                               $this->Dictionary = $this->unsafe_select( 'category_name IS NOT NULL' );
00474                         }
00475                         
00476                         foreach( $this->Dictionary as $k => $v )
00477                         {
00478                               if( get_field( $v , 'category_name' ) == $Name )
00479                               {
00480                                     return( get_field( $v , 'id' ) );
00481                               }
00482                         }
00483                         
00484                         throw( new Exception( "Category with name '$Name' was not found" ) );
00485                   }
00486                   catch( Exception $e )
00487                   {
00488                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00489                   }
00490             }

00586             function                get_siblings( $id )
00587             {
00588                   try
00589                   {
00590                         $ids = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer' );
00591                         
00592                         $Siblings = array();
00593                         
00594                         while( true )
00595                         {
00596                               $Children = $this->unsafe_select( "root_id IN ( $ids ) ORDER BY title" );
00597                               
00598                               if( isset( $Children[ 0 ] ) )
00599                               {
00600                                     $Siblings = array_merge( $Siblings , $Children );
00601                                     
00602                                     $ids = get_field_ex( $Children , 'id' );
00603                                     
00604                                     $ids = implode( ',' , $ids );
00605                               }
00606                               else
00607                               {
00608                                     return( $Siblings );
00609                               }
00610                         }
00611                   }
00612                   catch( Exception $e )
00613                   {
00614                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00615                   }
00616             }
